Step4 - å–æ¶ˆChromeè¿œç¨‹æ¡Œé¢æˆæƒ

å…¶ä»–

  • åˆ é™¤Chrome RDPåï¼Œé¿å…ä¸å¿…è¦çš„è´¹ç”¨ï¼šéœ€å½»åº•åˆ é™¤GCE Compute Engine å®ä¾‹ã€‚

 

ã€Anboxã€åœ¨Chrome RDPä¸­å®‰è£…Anboxï¼Œä»¥è¿è¡Œå®‰å“apk

 

Step1 - å®‰è£…anbox

#å‡†å¤‡å·¥ä½œ

sudo apt install software-properties-common       #In case add-apt-repository is missing

#ä¸ºrootç”¨æˆ·è®¾ç½®å¯†ç 

sudo -s
passwd

#å®‰è£…anboxæ­¥éª¤

  • Anboxå®˜æ–¹æ•™ç¨‹

  • Install Kernel Modules - Install with DKMS, Zip, PPAçš„æ–¹å¼ç›®å‰ä¸é€‚ç”¨äºDebian 10ï¼Œå› æ­¤æ¨èä½¿ç”¨â€Install with DKMSâ€ç›´æ¥ä¸‹è½½å¥½æ–‡ä»¶çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚

  • 1 - Install necessary kernel modules

    å‡†å¤‡å·¥ä½œ

      sudo apt install dkms
  sudo apt install linux-headers-4.19.0-8-cloud-amd64

    æ•™ç¨‹æ­¥éª¤: å…ˆä»GitHubå°†â€Anbox Kernel Modulesâ€œpackagesä¸‹è½½ä¸‹æ¥ã€‚

      $ sudo cp anbox.conf /etc/modules-load.d/
  $ sudo cp 99-anbox.rules /lib/udev/rules.d/

  $ sudo cp -rT ashmem /usr/src/anbox-ashmem-1
  $ sudo cp -rT binder /usr/src/anbox-binder-1

  $ sudo dkms install anbox-ashmem/1
  $ sudo dkms install anbox-binder/1

  $ sudo modprobe ashmem_linux
  $ sudo modprobe binder_linux
  $ lsmod | grep -e ashmem_linux -e binder_linux
  $ ls -alh /dev/binder /dev/ashmem

    load the kernel modules (The next time will be automatically loaded)

      $ sudo modprobe ashmem_linux
  $ sudo modprobe binder_linux

    System should have two new nodes in /dev directory (/dev/ashmem, /dev/binder)

      $ ls -1 /dev/{ashmem,binder}
  • 2 - Install the Anbox snap 
      sudo apt update
  sudo apt install snapd                      #å®‰è£…snapd
  sudo snap install --devmode --beta anbox    #ä½¿ç”¨snapå®‰è£…anbox beta, å®‰è£…å®Œæˆåé‡å¯Debian vps,anboxä¼šå‡ºç°åœ¨"å¼€å§‹èœå•"ä¸­
  systemctl reboot -i                         #Restart Debian Linux 

  sudo snap refresh --beta --devmode anbox    #udpate anbox manually
  snap info anbox                             #Info about the currently available versions of the snap

 

Step2 - ä¸ºAnboxå®‰è£…adb

#å®‰è£…adb

sudo apt install android-tools-adb
sudo ln -s /snap/bin/anbox /usr/bin/anbox         #Managed to run the session-manager after

#æ£€æŸ¥adbæ˜¯å¦å®‰è£…æˆåŠŸ

adb devices

#å®‰è£…APKç¨‹åº

#å¸è½½APKç¨‹åº

adb uninstall [APP_ID]                        #å¸è½½ç¨‹åºï¼Œæ³¨æ„æ˜¯[APP_ID]è€Œéæ–‡ä»¶åç§°

#ä»Linux VPSå‘anboxäº’ç›¸ç§»åŠ¨æ•°æ®

adb push <files> '/sdcard/Download'           #ä»Linuxå‘anboxä¼ é€æ•°æ®

å®æµ‹åˆ†äº«å’Œæ³¨æ„ç‚¹

    • äº²æµ‹å‘ç°ï¼Œå½“cableä¸¤ç«¯æ— éœ€è½¬æ¢æ¥å£æ—¶ï¼Œæ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“å’ŒUSBè°ƒè¯•å‡å¯æ­£å¸¸å·¥ä½œï¼›ä½†å½“cableä¸¤ç«¯(æˆ–ä»»ä¸€ç«¯å£)éœ€è½¬æ¢æ¥å£æ—¶ï¼Œä»…æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“å¯æ­£å¸¸å·¥ä½œï¼ŒUSBè°ƒè¯•æ— ååº”ã€‚å› æ­¤ï¼Œå»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨æ— éœ€è½¬æ¢æ¥å£çš„cableç›´æ¥è¿æ¥ä¸¤éƒ¨æ‰‹æœºã€‚

 

  • æ“ä½œæ­¥éª¤

    1. æ‰‹æœº#1ï¼šå°†USB OTGæ•°æ®äº¤æ¢åŠŸèƒ½æ‰“å¼€ã€‚

    4. æ‰‹æœº#2ï¼šåœ¨å¼¹å‡ºçš„â€USBåå¥½è®¾ç½®â€ä¸­ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©USBå—æ§äº - æ­¤è®¾å¤‡(å¦‚æœæœ‰è¯¥é€‰é¡¹)ï¼›é€‰æ‹©USBç”¨é€” - ä¸è¿›è¡Œæ•°æ®ä¼ è¾“ã€‚
    5. æ‰‹æœº#1ï¼šæ‰“å¼€Termuxï¼Œè·å–suåï¼Œè¾“å…¥adb devicesã€‚
    6. æ‰‹æœº#2ï¼šå¼¹å‡ºå…è®¸USBè°ƒè¯•å—ï¼Ÿçª—å£ï¼Œæ‰“å‹¾ä¸€å¾‹å…è®¸ä½¿ç”¨è¿™å°è®¡ç®—æœºè¿›è¡Œè°ƒè¯•&ç‚¹å‡»å…è®¸ã€‚
    7. æ‰‹æœº#1ï¼šå½“ç¬¬6æ­¥éª¤â€è¢«å…è®¸â€åï¼Œâ€æ‰‹æœº#1â€SDcardæ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆä¸¤ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ - adbkeyã€adbkey.pubã€‚
    8. æ‰‹æœº#1ï¼šTermuxè·å–suåï¼Œè¾“å…¥adb devicesåï¼Œå½“çœ‹åˆ°â€æ‰‹æœº#1â€çš„è®¾å¤‡å·æ—¶ï¼Œå³æˆåŠŸäº†ã€‚è¿›è€Œï¼Œè¾“å…¥éœ€è¦çš„adbå‘½ä»¤ã€‚
    9. (optional) æ‰‹æœº#2ï¼šå®‰å…¨èµ·è§ï¼Œå®Œæˆç›¸å…³æ“ä½œåï¼Œå°†USBè°ƒè¯•å…³é—­ã€‚æ’¤é”€USBè°ƒè¯•æˆæƒã€‚

 

æ‰‹æœº#1
æ‰‹æœº#2

 

  • ADB Commands

    • å¯åŠ¨shizuku
      • æ‰‹æœºæ¯æ¬¡é‡å¯åæˆ–è€…å› â€USBè°ƒè¯•â€å…³é—­è€Œå¤±æ•ˆï¼Œéƒ½éœ€è¦å†æ¬¡å¯åŠ¨shizuku (å½“â€shizukuâ€æœªå¯åŠ¨æ—¶ï¼ŒApp Opsä¸å¯è¿›å…¥è®¾ç½®ï¼Œä½†â€App Opsâ€å·²è®¾ç½®è¿‡çš„åº”ç”¨æƒé™ï¼Œæ°¸ä¹…æœ‰æ•ˆ)ã€‚ 
          adb shell sh /sdcard/Android/data/moe.shizuku.privileged.api/files/start.sh

     

    • greenify â€ƒ(ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§è®¾ç½®å³å¯)
      • Accessibility service run-on-demand: 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
      • Aggressive Doze on Android 7.0+ (non-root): 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
      • Doze on the Go: 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.DUMP
      • Aggressive Doze (on device/ROM with Doze disabled): 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.DUMP
      • Wake-up Tracker: 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.READ_LOGS
      • Background-free enforcement on Android 8+ (non-root): 
          adb -d shell pm grant com.oasisfeng.greenify android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS

     

    • full backup/restore all Android deviceâ€™s data w/o rootï¼Œè¯¦è§£
      • full backup (can encrypt your backup with a password) 
          adb backup -apk -shared -all -f <filepath>/backup.ab

        å¦ï¼Œç½‘ç»œä¸Šå»ºè®®ï¼šbacking up music, pictures, video, and other internal storage items manuallyï¼›SMSè‡ªè¡Œå•ç‹¬å¤‡ä»½ã€‚

      • full restore 
          adb restore <filepath>/backup.ab

     

    • Island æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ é€é—¨ - File Shuttle â€ƒ(ä¸€æ¬¡æ€§è®¾ç½®å³å¯) 
        pm grant com.oasisfeng.island android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS
